title: Black Francis
summary: Charles ThompsonÂ IV[1] (born April 6, 1965) is an American singer, songwriter, and guitarist.[1] He is best known as the frontman of the alternative rock band Pixies, with whom he performs under the stage name Black Francis.[2] Following the band's breakup in 1993, he embarked on a solo career under the name Frank Black.[3]  After releasing two albums with record label 4AD and one with American Recordings, he left the label and formed a new band, Frank Black and the Catholics. He re-adopted the name Black Francis in 2007.
